title: Will QUADAS-C Make a Complicated Task Less Complex?

Unfortunately, such studies are often unavailable and clinicians must rely on test accuracy as a surrogate to assess the effect of tests on people-important outcomes (1). Furthermore, tests are often evaluated as a replacement for an existing test or as an addition (simultaneously or sequentially) to a testing strategy already in use in clinical practice.
